ModMetaData.name: More Digestion Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 3 new Digestion Genes, 2 that decrease raw food digestion to 20% and 60%, and 1 that increases efficiency(140%) and removes the ate raw food debuff.
Included in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2985153870]More Biotech Style Genes - All in One[/url]
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/MoreDigestionGenes][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
